commandDescription: Generate test data from a sample data folder by maping record type developer name with the Id from the target org
nameFlagDescription: name of the PermisionSet That will be generated
folderFlagDescription: sfdx source folder that will be parsed to populate the permissionSet
sampleFolderDescription: name of the sample folder that will be used as input
outputFolderDescription: name of the output folder that will contain the modified files
diffFileDescription: name of the file which shows changes between commits
